title: Are Jekyll and Hyde the same person? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. Henry Jekyll was suppressing the dark part of his personality for a long time, and eventually made a potion to bring out his dark side, and this is how Edward Hyde happened. He’s basically Dr Jekyll’s alter ego.
Yes. Literally, both of them inhabit the same body. More figuratively, they are two sides of the same person.
Yes. Hyde is the hidden Id of Dr. Henry Jekyll. They share the same body. You could say that Hyde is the repressed side of Henry Jekyll.
